evidence.claim: CredEvolv utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
CredEvolv complies with HIPAA regulations for data security in health tech.
The company supports EDI X12 transactions for healthcare data integration.
Integration with FHIR APIs for health data is mentioned in their interoperability section.

icp.icp_reason: Company focuses on EDI and healthcare APIs, indicating use of X12 transactions.
